def api_py_function(address, postal_code, surface,nb_main_rooms,year):
    
    df = pd.DataFrame([[address, postal_code, surface,nb_main_rooms,year]],columns=['address','postal_code','surface','nb_main_rooms','year'])
    
    df['adress_full'] = df['address']+', '+df['postal_code'].astype(str)
